channel.title: THEHACKERSLABS on Pylon
channel.description: Recent content in THEHACKERSLABS on Pylon

item.title: Aceituno
item.description: Enumeration Vamos a empezar con un escaneo nmap: ┌──(pylon㉿kali)-[~/…/pylon/THL/Aceituno/nmap] └─$ nmap -p- --open -sS --min-rate=5000 -n -Pn -vvv 192.168.44.138 Starting Nmap 7.
